statements: SELECT course_name, instructor_name, completion_rate FROM course_completion_rate;
SELECT course_name, completion_rate FROM course_completion_rate WHERE completion_rate > 0.8;
SELECT * FROM course_completion_rate ORDER BY completion_rate DESC;
SELECT course_id, course_name FROM course_completion_rate WHERE instructor_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT course_name, completion_rate FROM course_completion_rate WHERE completion_rate BETWEEN 0.5 AND 0.8;
SELECT course_name, completion_rate FROM course_completion_rate WHERE completion_rate > 0.8 ORDER BY course_name ASC;
SELECT instructor_name, course_name, completion_rate FROM course_completion_rate WHERE instructor_name = 'John Doe' ORDER BY completion_rate DESC;
SELECT course_name, completion_rate FROM course_completion_rate ORDER BY completion_rate ASC, course_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM course_completion_rate WHERE course_name LIKE 'Eng%';
SELECT course_id, instructor_name FROM course_completion_rate WHERE completion_rate < 0.5 ORDER BY instructor_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM CourseCompletionRates ORDER BY completion_rate DESC;
SELECT course_id, completion_rate FROM CourseCompletionRates WHERE completion_rate > 0.8;
SELECT * FROM TeachingMethodologies WHERE methodology_id = 3;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CourseCompletionRates;
SELECT methodology_name, description FROM TeachingMethodologies ORDER BY methodology_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM CourseCompletionRates WHERE completion_rate > 0.8;
SELECT course_id, completion_rate FROM CourseCompletionRates WHERE completion_rate < 0.5 ORDER BY completion_rate DESC;
SELECT course_id, completion_rate FROM CourseCompletionRates WHERE course_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT methodology_name, description FROM TeachingMethodologies WHERE methodology_id = 2;
SELECT methodology_id, methodology_name, description FROM TeachingMethodologies ORDER BY methodology_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM course_progress WHERE completion_status = TRUE;
SELECT student_id, feedback FROM student_feedback;
SELECT methodology_name, effectiveness_score FROM teaching_methodologies WHERE effectiveness_score > 4.5;
SELECT course_id, student_id, completion_status FROM course_progress WHERE student_id = 123;
SELECT methodology_id, methodology_name FROM teaching_methodologies ORDER BY methodology_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM course_progress WHERE student_id = 1
SELECT course_id, student_id FROM course_progress WHERE completion_status = TRUE
SELECT student_id, feedback FROM student_feedback WHERE student_id = 3
SELECT methodology_name, effectiveness_score FROM teaching_methodologies WHERE effectiveness_score > 8.0
SELECT * FROM course_progress JOIN student_feedback ON course_progress.student_id = student_feedback.student_id
SELECT * FROM course_completion_rates;
SELECT course_id, completion_rate FROM course_completion_rates WHERE completion_rate > 0.8;
SELECT * FROM teaching_methodologies ORDER BY methodology_name DESC;
SELECT course_name, course_duration FROM courses WHERE course_duration > 10;
SELECT instructor_name, department FROM instructors WHERE instructor_id = 3;
SELECT course_name, course_duration FROM courses WHERE course_id = 1;
SELECT instructor_name, department FROM instructors WHERE department = 'Engineering';
SELECT methodology_name, description FROM teaching_methodologies WHERE methodology_id = 3;
SELECT instructor_name, department, course_name FROM instructors JOIN courses ON instructors.instructor_id = courses.course_id;
SELECT course_name, completion_rate FROM courses JOIN course_completion_rates ON courses.course_id = course_completion_rates.course_id AND completion_rate > 80;
SELECT * FROM courses;
SELECT course_name, instructor_name FROM courses WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT course_name, completion_rate FROM courses ORDER BY completion_rate DESC;
SELECT student_name, email FROM students WHERE enrollment_date < '2022-06-01';
SELECT assessment_name, max_score, achieved_score FROM assessments WHERE max_score > 50;
SELECT * FROM courses WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY completion_rate DESC;
SELECT student_name, email FROM students WHERE enrollment_date < '2022-04-01' ORDER BY student_name;
SELECT course_name, instructor_name FROM courses JOIN enrollments ON courses.course_id = enrollments.course_id WHERE completion_status = TRUE;
SELECT course_name, assessment_name, max_score FROM courses JOIN assessments ON courses.course_id = assessments.course_id ORDER BY max_score DESC;
SELECT student_name, feedback_text FROM students JOIN feedback ON students.student_id = feedback.student_id WHERE feedback_date > '2022-03-01';
